resources.string: This app is used to wake you up.If anyone has slept with his/her phone on silent,then he or she may not be contactable in Emergercy. So the person worrying can send a text message "WAKE UP" on your phone,then your phone will change to ringer mode and will play a sound to alert you or wake you UP.You can also find your phone if it is misplaced in silent mode. The best part about this app is that you do not need active Internet connection to run this.You can also have a restriction to give access to this WAKE UP to some of your contacts. .You can also choose your favourite ringtone to play.
